PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-22121999-12-160,  ,  ,  FIN, 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS which provide that anyone who has paid or credited a taxable amount to a non-resident in respect of eligible funeral arrangements will be required to file a tax return in that regard, and exempt from the requirement to file an annual tax return anyone who, in a fiduciary capacity, receives income, gains or profits from a tax-exempt cemetery care trust.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0013 Publication Date: 2000-01-05
Attachments
